text: Jeremiah Wilson "Jay" Nixon (born February 13, 1956) is an American politician. He was the Governor of Missouri from 2009 to 2017. He is a member of the Democratic Party of the United States. Nixon's ancestor, John Inskeep, was mayor of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Missouri Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Missouri attorneys general
title: Jay Nixon
